Hello, there. I’m Abdul Rahman. I’m a final year Computer Engineering student from the National University of Singapore. I have a comprehensive knowledge in both Computer architecture as well as software development. My current focus is on research and application development using Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Tech Path
(Under Development) Built with ReactJS, Tech Path aims to solve the problem of having thousands of free online coding tutorials, articles, and projects at your finger tips but no good way to keep track of what you've finished, how you're progressing, and which one you'd like to do next
